**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 235 2.0 **Bloodline** [Nymph](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=12) **Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283) **Area** 30-foot cone **Saving Throw** Will --- You channel the allure of your nymph bloodline into a terribly beautiful glance. Each enemy in the area must attempt a Will saving throw. **Critical Success** The creature is unaffected.
**Success** The creature is [dazzled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=7) until the start of its next turn.
**Failure** The creature is [blinded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=1) until the start of its next turn.
**Critical Failure** The creature is blinded for 1 minute.
name: Blinding Beauty
